text:
@TerryMoran Good Look:  Joe doing his part to help protect himself (& others) by wearing a mask during a pandemic that's killed a 100,000 Americans over a 3month period.

Bad Look:  POTUS helping the spread of COVID-19 by his refusal to wear a mask.
